Summary: Space Cutter type of craft that created triangle and moved through it!
divs: Sighting DetailsAt around 1-1:30 am this which can be described as a Space Cutter appeared while we were on break outside of Lil'Chef in Brighton Mich.It created a trail of energy behind it and Moved through this triangle in a particular flight path,5 other people seen this event.
